classification: Tools, Equipment and Utilitarian Objects; Accessories
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: Cylindrical button-like object; incised and relief. Light brown mottled jade; the surface is completely decorated with double incised design of 'comma' pattern. Pair with 50.46.326. Cat.Card Dims.H.17/32 x Di.31/32 in.
title: Cylindrical Button-like Object, one of a pair
